show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG, www.drznaturally.
com interviews Jacob Teitelbaum, MD Dr Teitelbaum is a reknown integrative medical authority, and is the medical director of Fibromyalgia and Fatigue Centers.
DrTeitlebaum  is the author of the best-selling From Fatigued to Fantastic!
(which has sold over 500,000 copies), Pain Free, 1,2,3!, Beat Sugar Addiction Now!, the Beat Sugar Addiction Now Cookbook and his latest book, Real Cause Real Cure.
 Dr Teitelbaum knows CFS/fibromyalgia as an insider — he contracted CFS when he was in medical school and had to drop out for a year to recover.
In the ensuing 25 years, he has dedicated his career to finding effective treatment.
 Dr Teitelbaum appears often as a guest on Oprah,  Dr Oz, CNN, Fox, ABC and on news and talk shows nationwide.
He joins us today on The Natural Nurse and Dr Z.
Contact: http://jacobteitelbaum.com
